<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/spaces/{spaceId}/devices/nonSmartMeter"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Create non-smart-meter device

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"in":"path","name":"spaceId","schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"required":true}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"description":"<ul>\n    <li>The <b>deviceMedium</b> can be : ELECTRICITY,GAS,WATER,HEATING </li>\n    <li>The <b>deviceType</b> can be : SMART_METER, OPTICAL_METER_SENSOR, WALLBOX, SMART_PLUG, SMART_RELAY, VIRTUAL_LANDLORD_TO_TENANT_METER, ENERGY_METER, NON_SMART_METER, HEAT_PUMP, MICRO_INVERTER </li>\n    <li>The <b>isMainDevice</b> if device the main device of the space</li>\n    <li>The <b>consumptionReadingValue</b> and the <b>ingestionReadingValue</b> can be used together if the non smart meter is bidirectional</li>\n    <li>The <b>readingUnit</b> can be:  KILO_WATT_HOUR, WATT, CUBIC_METRE, KILO_GRAMM, LITERS_PER_MINUTE, KILO_GRAMM_CO2, EURO, EURO_PER_KILO_WATT_HOUR, PERCENT, CENT_PER_KWH, KILO_WATT</li>\n    <li>The <b>isReadingUpdate</b> is set to true when an update of a previously store reading is required</li>\n</ul>\n","required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"allOf":[{"type":"object","required":["deviceName","isMainDevice","deviceType","deviceMedium"],"properties":{"deviceName":{"type":"string","x-order":1},"isMainDevice":{"type":"boolean","description":"if device the main device of the space","x-order":2},"deviceType":{"type":"string","enum":["SMART_METER","OPTICAL_METER_SENSOR","WALLBOX","SMART_PLUG","SMART_RELAY","VIRTUAL_LANDLORD_TO_TENANT_METER","ENERGY_METER","NON_SMART_METER","HEAT_PUMP","MICRO_INVERTER"],"x-order":3},"deviceMedium":{"type":"string","enum":["ELECTRICITY","GAS","WATER","HEATING"],"x-order":4}},"title":"NewDevice"},{"type":"object","required":["readingMeasurementTime","readingUnit","consumptionReadingValue"],"properties":{"deviceType":{"type":"string","enum":["NON_SMART_METER"],"default":"NON_SMART_METER"},"isBidirectional":{"type":"boolean","default":false},"readingMeasurementTime":{"type":"integer","format":"int64"},"readingUnit":{"type":"string","enum":["KILO_WATT_HOUR","WATT","CUBIC_METRE","KILO_GRAMM","LITERS_PER_MINUTE","KILO_GRAMM_CO2","EURO","EURO_PER_KILO_WATT_HOUR","PERCENT","CENT_PER_KWH","KILO_WATT"]},"consumptionReadingValue":{"type":"number","format":"double"},"ingestionReadingValue":{"type":"number","format":"double"},"isReadingUpdate":{"type":"boolean","default":false},"serialNumber":{"type":"string"}}}],"title":"NewNonSmartMeter"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"the registered device id","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"properties":{"deviceId":{"type":"string"}},"title":"DeviceId"}}}}}}
